message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today.  I think it would really meet your needs. I'm asking for $10,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a budget to stick to.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $7,500 is a little too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $9,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8,200. Can we meet at that price?
